Shubha B S wrote:
> 
> 
> David,
> 
> with System.getProperty("var"); I am able to get the value assigned, I 
> want to know how long that variable will be available for me, But my 
> question is how long this variable available for me?
> Is it for the entire ant session or just for single JVM? If I have 10 
> test cases in my junit batchtest..
> 10 jvms will come into picture.. I want this value to be available to 
> all the jvms..

I imagine the data is available for only the lifetime of the JVM.

Is the value likely to change during the test run, between JVM 
instances? Why? Perhaps that's something you want to test!

I can immediately imagine running one Java process before running your 
tests that retrieve the system property, writes it to file, then your 
tests read from that file. This would help all 10 JVMs use the same 
value for that property. The first Java process could even generate a 
script that would run your tests with the system property value fixed.

Good luck.
